summary: Constantly trying to avoid Endgame spoilers is a struggle and people need to be more respectful.

To the assholes who post them. Go fuck off.

summary:
tony: how do i get someone to like me?
rhodey: tell them about yourself. 
*later*
tony, to stephen: i'm socially awkward and can...
body:
tony: how do i get someone to like me?

rhodey: tell them about yourself.

*later*

blog.name: metaphysicalnerdomduelist

Kat/24/demisexual

I belong to an abundance of different fandoms.

tags: if i had a twitter i would @ Chris Evans with this shit
anyone want to write me a fanfic based on this?
body:
Captain Mic Drop

The craziest thing happened in my dream last night, and I’m glad I still remembered it when I woke up.

So there I am, getting attacked by some bad guy for no apparent reason when Captain America, Iron Man, and Spider-Man come to my rescue.

Cap pulls the guy off me while the other two get me to safety, but my brain stays focused on the fight. As Cap beats this guy bloody, the guy says, “You’re wouldn’t kill me, would you, Captain America?”

Cap stops his next punch from connecting and grabs the guy by the collar before leaning in close and saying, “Do you know how many Nazis I’ve killed, son? Not enough to give a fuck.”

The shield punch to the face kills the guy, and Cap comes to check on me…


Honestly, I’m just shook by that mic-drop-worthy line, and now I’m depressed that I can’t pitch it as something that should happen in Endgame.

Captain Mic Drop

The craziest thing happened in my dream last night, and I’m glad I still remembered it when I woke up.

So there I am, getting attacked by some bad guy for no apparent reason when Captain America, Iron Man, and Spider-Man come to my rescue.

Cap pulls the guy off me while the other two get me to safety, but my brain stays focused on the fight. As Cap beats this guy bloody, the guy says, “You’re wouldn’t kill me, would you, Captain America?”

Cap stops his next punch from connecting and grabs the guy by the collar before leaning in close and saying, “Do you know how many Nazis I’ve killed, son? Not enough to give a fuck.”

The shield punch to the face kills the guy, and Cap comes to check on me…


Honestly, I’m just shook by that mic-drop-worthy line, and now I’m depressed that I can’t pitch it as something that should happen in Endgame.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: In 'Z' End **Coming Soon**
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IIKXZp

by Lone_Wolf_Fanfics

When the world is overrun by cannibalistic reanimated corpses, those that survive must fight back. Among the survivors is a young woman called Sweet Pea. This follows her journeys through the apocalypse, the zombies and her feelings towards Clint Barton, her companion, and savior. It’s not easy falling in love at the end of the world. More so when everything around you wants to eat you but the unlucky pair must depend on each other just to survive.

Words: 804, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Avengers (Comics), Hawkeye (Comics), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, Marvel (Comics), Supernatural, The Vampire Diaries (TV), The Vampire Diaries & Related Fandoms

summary: And maybe you're not the villain, maybe you are the hero
title: And maybe you're not the villain, maybe you are the hero
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2UKXTFC

by cutebutpsyco

IRONSTRANGE BINGO. FILL: ENEMIES TO LOVERS || He didn’t change his position and wasn’t surprised when Nat didn’t either, but there was something, in her jade eyes, that had Tony wanting to know more about what she believed was the man’s intent. “His methods might be wrong, but he’s trying to expose how the governments treat enhanced people all over the world. It’s what you, us, had been tried to do since the aftermath of the Accords.”

Words: 2546, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 20 of Ironstrange Bingo 2019 Fills, Part 15 of Endgame Countdown

body: Aaaah! He’s so magnificent!

trail.content: Aaaah! He’s so magnificent!

summary: Peter, sent on a mission by Happy to get him off his back, gathering Intel on Nick Fury to question why he needs so much...
body:
Peter, sent on a mission by Happy to get him off his back, gathering Intel on Nick Fury to question why he needs so much tuna.

Nick walking in the house: Bubby, Bubby you’re my honey.

Peter, softly : What the fuck.

Karen: The Immediate Danger protocol has been activated.

Peter, panicking : WhAt No KaReN!

Tony, over the ear piece: Friday pull up the footage.

Nick, walking over to Goose: Honey, Honey, you’re my Bubby.

Tony, with the rest of Avengers watching : WHat the FuCK!?

Peter: That’s what I said!

Nick, picking up Goose: Wubbie, Wubbie you’re my Snuggie.

Tony, with tears in his eyes: WhY?

Nick falling on the couch, kicking his shoes off and kicking his feet as he rubs his nose against Goose: Snoogie, Snoogie you’re my Snookie.

Peter: Isn’t she from Jersey Shore?

Tony, sobbing: MAke it EnD! PLeaSE.

Nick, now lifting Goose over his head and twirling her: Snuggie, Snuggie you’re my Snoogie.

Steve, throughly confused and crying: Is this what he meant when he said he had to get tuna for the misses?!?

Goose growling as Nick pulls back: Snookie, Snookie you’re my boobie!

Thor, laughing: He has become one with the lesbians!

tags: I really don't know what this turned into
I love this mutant idea a lot
summary: 1) Omg. Imagine Tony's a mutant and was planning on telling everyone but then the accords happen and he doesnt trust any of them...
question: 1) Omg. Imagine Tony's a mutant and was planning on telling everyone but then the accords happen and he doesnt trust any of them anymore even though they ALL are back at the compound. He closes himself off to them, rarely comes out of the lab anymore and all that. And the team is honestly trying to make it up to him, he just cant trust them like he used to.  Like I believe his mutant abilities would be Technopathy.
answer:
2) & when Cap talks to him he says “Its not that you ramed my dads shield into my chest and left me bleeding out. It’s that you knew my mom was murdered and never FUCKING TOLD ME” and the team is shook cuz his voice breaks a bit at the end. “Its not that you all sided against the accords, it’s that I fought so fucking hard to change the original so none of you had a fucking death sentence staring you in the face and none of you even looked at the revision I sent you”
3) and the only ones who arent in the wrong are Thor and Bruce so they’re fine but the fact that they weren’t there hurts Tony far more than he let’s on. Cuz in Tony’s mind its linked to the abandonment Tony felt that his dad was never there for him so he has some issues there. + Not even Rhodes, Pep or Happy know hes a mutant and only Charles knows and Charles is heartbroken cuz he hasnt seen Tony like this since his parents died

4 (kinda lost count). Tony decides to leave for a while (like half a year) and they dont know hes at Charles place. Doesnt tell anything to Rhodes (He’s recovering he doesnt need my problems on his shoulders) Pep (She’s a CEO and really busy so I wont bother her) & Happy (Poor guy has been stuck with my ass for years, I don’t wanna burden him) so they show up at the tower after 3 months of this and demand to see him only to find out hes not there and off the map.

Oof, I really love the idea of Tony having Technopathy (he talks to his machines anyway– it’s the fucking cutest) but the rest of this is just so. heartbreaking. 

I think that after Tony goes off the grid, everyone is frantic. If even Pepper, Rhodey, and Happy don’t know where Tony is, it’s definitely cause for concern. So they start a manhunt for him, which Charles informs him of, but Tony is still licking his wounds and needs more time.

After another three months, he calls them from Xavier’s and (with Charles’s permission of course), invites them to the school. It’s where he feels safest revealing this last secret of his, and he knows its time to put all of his cards on the table.

He expects shock, disgust, fear; anything but the tears that fall from his best friends eyes as he hugs him tight. Anything but Pepper’s understanding smile and warm embrace. Anything but Happy’s ramblings about changing security now that his boss is a freakin’ mutant. Anything but the team’s stunned silence that precedes the group hug and wave of apologizes he receives.

They’re sorry they didn’t make him feel safe enough to tell them. Sorry he had to carry this secret on his own. Sorry he had to run away from it all. Sorry they weren’t there for him.

Tony’s just sorry he didn’t tell them sooner.

blog.name: student-dying-inside
blog.title: stuff
blog.description:
mostly reposts but I sprinkle in the occasional OC
ask box always open

body:
Clean Slate

I’ve heard people say that Iron Man 3’s whole character plot was ruined when Tony appeared again using an Iron Man suit…

Well, I was just rewatching it as a part of my preparation for Endgame and I think that what Tony did there wasn’t meant to be the end of Iron Man.

I think it was meant to be the end of Tony’s dependance on the suits.

Remember this movie was about Tony dealing with PTSD and Anxiety and from the beginning we see Tony hiding behind his suit. In fact, at the end he says that the suit was a cocoon.

In this movie we see him fighting without a suit for the first time and when at the end he says “I am Iron Man” I think it has a different meaning than when he said it at the end of the first movie.

When he says it for the first time it means that he is the one in the suit, when he says it at the end of the third movie it means he is Iron Man with or without the suit.

That’s what the Clean Slate means. He is starting over, with a new mentality, being better than he was before.

He is Tony Stark, he is Iron Man. And he doesn’t need a suit to be any of them.
